events.message: Applicant has submitted a personal loan application to cover unexpected medical bills totaling $8,500.
The loan application has been categorized under personal loan due to the purpose being related to medical expenses.
Loan officer Sarah Jensen has been assigned to handle the personal loan application and guide the applicant through the process.
Initial review of the applicant's credit history and submitted information is underway, pending documentation from the applicant.
Applicant has been requested to provide hospital bills, insurance statements, and proof of income for medical expense verification.
The applicant submitted all requested documents including hospital bills and recent pay stubs to support the personal loan application.
Credit check has been completed with a credit score of 710, reflecting a good credit history suitable for loan approval.
Risk assessment performed indicating low risk due to stable income and sufficient credit score despite recent medical debts.
A loan offer of $9,000 with a 5-year repayment term and 7% interest rate presented to the applicant for review and acceptance.
Applicant responded positively and requested additional information about the monthly payment schedule and early payment options.
Application was escalated to the loan committee to address applicant requests and finalize loan terms based on feedback.
The personal loan application was approved by the committee, confirming terms including interest rate and repayment schedule.
Loan funds amounting to $9,000 were successfully disbursed to the applicantâ€™s bank account for medical expense coverage.
Follow-up with the applicant to ensure satisfaction with the loan process and provide assistance with repayment tracking tools.
The loan application process has been formally closed following the successful funding and initial follow-up with the borrower.
